channel.title: redis-server on Spectre Pixel Theme
channel.description: Recent content in redis-server on Spectre Pixel Theme

item.title: [linux] redis 설치
item.description: Amazon Linux 2 환경에서 redis 설치 # yum udpate sudo yum -y update # C 컴파일러 설치 sudo yum -y install gcc make # redis 설치 wget http://download.redis.io/redis-stable.tar.gz tar xvzf redis-stable.tar.gz cd redis-stable make # redis 설정 파일 복사 sudo mkdir /etc/redis sudo mkdir /var/lib/redis cd redis-stable sudo cp src/redis-server src/redis-cli /usr/local/bin cp redis.conf /etc/redis # redis 스크립트 다운로드 wget https://raw.github.com/saxenap/install-redis-amazon-linux-centos/master/redis-server cd /usr/local/bin sudo mv redis-server /etc/init.d sudo chmod 755 /etc/init.
